name: Creative Cooking (Inside Goods & Co.)
text:
LOCAL. HANDMADE. CREATIVE Creative Cooking Local. Handmade. Creative

VEGGIE SAMOSA CHAAT $13.00 GOLDEN, CRISPY PASTRY FILLED WITH POTATO AND SPICES COMES WITH 3 UNIQUE SAUCES

PANEER SAMOSA CHAAT $15.00 PASTRY ROLLED IN CHILLY FLAKES, FILLED WITH SOFT CRUMBLE PANEER AND SPINACH IN OUR SPICES COMES WITH 3 UNIQUE SAUCES

BEEF SAMOSA CHAAT $17.00 PERFECTLY FRIED PASTRY ROLLED IN CARROM SEEDS, FILLED WITH UMAMI FLAVOURED GROUND BEEF, MUSHROOMS AND 3 UNIQUE SAUCES

BUTTER CHICKEN MAC AND CHEESE $15.00 RICH AND CREAMY BUTTER CHICKEN MEETS THE TRADITIONAL MAC AND CHEESE, GREAT MOZZARELLA ROTINI PASTA, TOPPED WITH CRISPY FRIED SHALLOTS AND ONIONS

MAC AND CHEESE $12.00 TRADITIONAL THREE-CHEESE BLEND WITH TOUCH OF OUR OWN SPICE BLEND, MOZZARELLA, BAKED TO PERFECTION TOPPED WITH GREEN ONIONS

DIPS

BUTTER CHICKEN SPINACH DIP $17.00 AUTHENTIC BUTTER CHICKEN MEETS THE CREAMY, CHEESY, DELICIOUS SPINACH DIP THAT GETS SERVED WITH FLOUR TOASTADAS

REG. SPINACH DIP $15.00 CREAMY, CHEESY, DELICIOUS SPINACH DIP THAT GETS SERVED WITH FLOUR TOASTADAS

ROASTED RED PEPPER HUMMUS $16.00 RICH, CREAMY AND GARLICKY HUMMUS WITH SESAME OIL, TOPPED WITH CARAMELISED BEANS AND CREAM OF RED PEPPER WITH TOASTED SESAME SEEDS. SERVED WITH TOASTADAS

SPECIALS

SOUP DU JOUR / NOODLE BOWL SOUP OF THE DAY, NOODLE BOWLS ARE ONLY AVAILABLE DURING FRIDAY

PARTY PACK OF SAMOSAS INQUIRE US ABOUT VARIETY OF SIZES

PARTY SIZE BUTTER CHICKEN MAC AND CHEESE INQUIRE US ABOUT THE SIZE OF PARTY MAC AND CHEESE AND FROZEN OPTIONS
